${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AbsentMinded.NAME: Absent-Minded
${modID}:AbsentMinded.DESCRIPTION: Play and Forget the top card in your draw pile.

${modID}:AllNighter.NAME: All-Nighter
${modID}:AllNighter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Insomnia. At the start of your turn, gain [E].

${modID}:AllADream.NAME: All a Dream
${modID}:AllADream.DESCRIPTION: Heal 20HP. NL At the end of combat, lose 15HP.

${modID}:AlterEgo.NAME: Alter Ego
${modID}:AlterEgo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Forget all other attack cards in your hand.

${modID}:AndAnotherThing.NAME: And Another Thing
${modID}:AndAnotherThing.DESCRIPTION: Awaken !M! card. NL If the car you choose costs [EE] or more, Awaken another card.

${modID}:Atemporality.NAME: Atemporality
${modID}:Atemporality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Forget the top card of your deck.

${modID}:BackAndForth.NAME: Back And Forth
${modID}:BackAndForth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Forget.

${modID}:BlankSlate.NAME: Blank Slate
${modID}:BlankSlate.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle every Forgotten card in play into your deck. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BrainZap.NAME: Brain Zap
${modID}:BrainZap.DESCRIPTION: Play and Forget the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:BreakTheCycle.NAME: Break The Cycle
${modID}:BreakTheCycle.DESCRIPTION: Forget 1 card. NL If you choose an Attack, gain its base damage as Block.

${modID}:CircadianRhythm.NAME: Circadian Rhythm
${modID}:CircadianRhythm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card. NL At the end of your turn, Forget !M! card.
${modID}:CircadianRhythm.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! card. NL At the end of your turn, Forget !M! card.

${modID}:ChosenOne.NAME: Chosen One
${modID}:ChosenOne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Vision. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Closure.NAME: Closure
${modID}:Closure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Remembered, gain !M! health. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Coma.NAME: Coma
${modID}:Coma.DESCRIPTION: Gain 99 Vision. NL This turn, when you draw a card that is not Forgotten, discard it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Commune.NAME: Commune
${modID}:Commune.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Vision. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it is a Forgotten card, play this card again.

${modID}:Compulsion.NAME: Compulsion
${modID}:Compulsion.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard. NL Forget.

${modID}:Daydream.NAME: Daydream
${modID}:Daydream.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, retain !M! random forgotten card.

${modID}:Dizzy.NAME: Dizzy
${modID}:Dizzy.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. Forget a random card in your hand. NL Forget.

${modID}:DreamSequence.NAME: Dream Sequence
${modID}:DreamSequence.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Forget 1 or more cards. NL Draw that many cards.

${modID}:DreamTraveler.NAME: Dream Traveler
${modID}:DreamTraveler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Transform this card for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Dredge.NAME: Dredge
${modID}:Dredge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put the next non-Forgotten card in your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:Egoism.NAME: Egoism (Check power)
${modID}:Egoism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card of cost 2 or more, draw 1 card.

${modID}:EnterDreams.NAME: Enter Dreams
${modID}:EnterDreams.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Insomnia from the target. Deal !D! damage and draw !M! card for each Insomnia removed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Envelop.NAME: Envelop
${modID}:Envelop.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Forgotten card in your deck.

${modID}:ExposureTherapy.NAME: Exposure Therapy
${modID}:ExposureTherapy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Trauma into your deck.

${modID}:Flashback.NAME: Flashback
${modID}:Flashback.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Awaken !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Flashback.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Awaken !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FlashForward.NAME: Flashforward
${modID}:FlashForward.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Gain !M! Vision. NL Draw !M! card. Exhaust.
${modID}:FlashForward.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Gain !M! Vision. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Foreshadowing.NAME: Foreshadowing
${modID}:Foreshadowing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you awaken a Skill this turn, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. Awaken !M! card.

${modID}:GrandRitual.NAME: Grand Ritual
${modID}:GrandRitual.DESCRIPTION: Awaken X cards. NL Gain X Vision.

${modID}:Groundwork.NAME: Groundwork
${modID}:Groundwork.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, Awaken !M! card.
${modID}:Groundwork.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, Awaken !M! cards.

${modID}:HappyPlace.NAME: Happy Place
${modID}:HappyPlace.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for every Forgotten card in your hand.

${modID}:HardReset.NAME: Hard Reset
${modID}:HardReset.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Lose all your Block. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 3 cards.

${modID}:Haze.NAME: Haze
${modID}:Haze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Insomnia to the attacker.

${modID}:Hibernation.NAME: Hibernation
${modID}:Hibernation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Forget a card, shuffle it back into your deck. NL When your draw pile is empty, Die.

${modID}:HideUnderTheCovers.NAME: Hide Under The Covers
${modID}:HideUnderTheCovers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Hypochondria.NAME: Hypochondria
${modID}:Hypochondria.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Remove all your debuffs. Exhaust.

${modID}:IgnoranceIsStrength.NAME: Ignorance Is Strength
${modID}:IgnoranceIsStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and draw 1 card for every Forgotten card in your hand.

${modID}:InnerChild.NAME: Inner Child
${modID}:InnerChild.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of the longest-forgotten card by !M!.

${modID}:InOneEar.NAME: In One Ear
${modID}:InOneEar.DESCRIPTION: The first time in your turn you Remember a card, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:IntoNextWeek.NAME: IntoNextWeek
${modID}:IntoNextWeek.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:Leitmotif.NAME: Leitmotif
${modID}:Leitmotif.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you Awaken another card, Awaken this card (if forgotten). NL Forget.

${modID}:LightSleeper.NAME: LightSleeper
${modID}:LightSleeper.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Forget all cards drawn this way except for Forgotten cards.

${modID}:LucidDream.NAME: Lucid Dream
${modID}:LucidDream.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Awaken !M! card and gain !M! Amnesia.

${modID}:Lurch.NAME: Lurch
${modID}:Lurch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Forget the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:MagicalThinking.NAME: Magical Thinking
${modID}:MagicalThinking.DESCRIPTION: Exchange the cost of this card with another card in your hand until the end of combat.

${modID}:MassSuggestion.NAME: Mass Suggestion
${modID}:MassSuggestion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this card is Remembered, apply !M! Insomnia to ALL enemies.

${modID}:MemorySkip.NAME: Memory Skip
${modID}:MemorySkip.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play costs 0.

${modID}:NewLeaf.NAME: New Leaf
${modID}:NewLeaf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Awaken 1 card and permanently Transform it.

${modID}:SelfDiscovery.NAME: Self Discovery
${modID}:SelfDiscovery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Awaken a card, upgrade it.

${modID}:Oblivious.NAME: Oblivious
${modID}:Oblivious.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Forget a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Opener.NAME: Opener
${modID}:Opener.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL  Deal !D! damage.  NL If this is the first card you played this turn, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

${modID}:PavlovianResponse.NAME: Pavlovian Response
${modID}:PavlovianResponse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Remember an Attack, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Precog.NAME: Precog
${modID}:Precog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target intends to attack, gain !M! Vision.

${modID}:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
${modID}:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !M! Vision.

${modID}:PsionicScream.NAME: Psionic Scream
${modID}:PsionicScream.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PsychicStorm.NAME: Psychic Storm
${modID}:PsychicStorm.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Strength. NL When you Remember an Attack, its damage is dealt to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PsychicTsunami.NAME: Psychic Tsunami
${modID}:PsychicTsunami.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of cards you Remembered this combat.

${modID}:Reckoning.NAME: Reckoning
${modID}:Reckoning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every Forgotten card in your hand.

${modID}:RecurringDream.NAME: RecurringDream
${modID}:RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. The next Forgotten card you play this turn is played twice.
${modID}:RecurringDream.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. The next 2 Forgotten cards you play this turn are played twice.

${modID}:Reflex.NAME: Reflex
${modID}:Reflex.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Forget a card in your hand.

${modID}:REMSleep.NAME: REM Sleep
${modID}:REMSleep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Forgotten card, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:Repress.NAME: Repress
${modID}:Repress.DESCRIPTION: Forget !M! card in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Forget.

${modID}:SelfProtection.NAME: Self Protection
${modID}:SelfProtection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Remembered, gain !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:SelfProtection.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Remembered, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Forget.

${modID}:SleepingPill.NAME: Sleeping Pill
${modID}:SleepingPill.DESCRIPTION: Urgent. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Forget a card.

${modID}:SleepNoMore.NAME: Sleep No More
${modID}:SleepNoMore.DESCRIPTION: Remove the target's Insomnia. NL Remove HP from the target equal to !M! times the Insomnia removed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Sleepwalk.NAME: Sleepwalk
${modID}:Sleepwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Forget a card.

${modID}:Slumber.NAME: Slumber
${modID}:Slumber.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you forgot a card this turn, gain [E] [E].

${modID}:SpinningStrike.NAME: Spinning strike
${modID}:SpinningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Dizzy into your deck.

${modID}:SpiritGuidance.NAME: Spirit Guidance
${modID}:SpiritGuidance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Remembered, gain [EE].
${modID}:SpiritGuidance.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Remembered, gain [EE]. NL Forget.

${modID}:Subliminal.NAME: Subliminal
${modID}:Subliminal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Remember a card, apply !M! Insomnia to the targeted enemy.

${modID}:TheatreOfTheMind.NAME: Theatre Of The Mind
${modID}:TheatreOfTheMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vision for each Forgotten Card in your hand.

${modID}:Torpor.NAME: Torpor
${modID}:Torpor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Remember a card, apply !M! Insomnia to the target.

${modID}:TossAndTurn.NAME: Toss And Turn
${modID}:TossAndTurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the cost of this card by 1 this combat.

${modID}:TriggerPhrase.NAME: Trigger Phrase
${modID}:TriggerPhrase.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Remembered, Awaken 1 card.
${modID}:TriggerPhrase.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Remembered, Awaken 1 card. NL Forget.

${modID}:WakeFromDanger.NAME: Wake From Danger
${modID}:WakeFromDanger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Remembered, gain an additional !M! Block.
${modID}:WakeFromDanger.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Remembered, gain an additional !M! Block. NL Forget.
